EmailTemplate.subject: Start saving with Direct Energy Solar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent inquiry regarding solar for your home. We just called you but were unable to leave you a phone message. We're reaching out via e-mail because we want to get you started on your way to instantly lowering your electricity costs as soon as we can!
Please give us a call back at 800-903-6130 and select the option for sales, or reply back to this email with a convenient time for us to call you. One of our solar specialists will consult with you to answer questions you may have and to determine if your home is a good candidate for solar. We will also set up an agreeable time that is convenient for you to have a solar consultant meet with you in your home to review your options.
Whether your decision to inquire about solar is because you want to save money on your electricity bill, or you want to have a bigger influence on our environment, Direct Energy Solar is an expert at installing residential solar and we will tailor a system to meet your specific needs.
Please call us at 800-903-6130 and select the option for sales so that we can get you started.
Thank you and have a great day.
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} 7101 Riverwood Drive Columbia, MD 21046 P: 800-903-6130 F: 800-949-1408 directenergysolar.com
Offers and financing are available to customers who qualify, vary by location, and are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates.
